Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Brain Diseases/Headache Disorders/Headache Disorders, Primary/Trigeminal Autonomic Cephalalgias/Paroxysmal Hemicrania
Record.Description: A primary headache disorder that is similar to the CLUSTER HEADACHE with unilateral head pain, but differs by its multiple short severe attacks. It is usually seen in females, and may be responsive to non-steroidal-anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDS).
